mapper.select: SELECT * FROM cc_article WHERE rid=#{rid} ORDER BY article_id
SELECT * FROM cc_menu WHERE rid=#{rid} and article_id=#{articleId} ORDER BY id
SELECT * FROM cc_tag WHERE rid=#{rid} and article_id=#{articleId} ORDER BY tag_id
SELECT * FROM cc_img WHERE rid=#{rid} and article_id=#{articleId} ORDER BY img_id
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cc_rest (rid, name, lat, lng, status) VALUES (#{rid}, #{name}, #{lat}, #{lng}, #{status});

INSERT INTO cc_article (article_id, rid, comment, status, likes, hate, write_dt, uid) VALUES (#{articleId}, #{rid}, #{comment}, #{status}, #{likes}, #{hate}, NOW(), #{uid}) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE comment=#{comment}, status=#{status}, likes=#{likes}, hate=#{hate}, write_dt=NOW(), uid=#{uid}

INSERT INTO cc_menu (id, rid, article_id, img_id, x, y, menu, price) VALUES
(#{menu.id}, #{menu.rid}, #{menu.articleId}, #{menu.imgId}, #{menu.x}, #{menu.y}, #{menu.menu}, #{menu.price})

INSERT INTO cc_tag (tag_id, rid, article_id, tag) VALUES
(#{tag.tagId}, #{tag.rid}, #{tag.articleId}, #{tag.tag})

INSERT INTO cc_img (img_id, rid, article_id, path) VALUES
(#{img.imgId}, #{img.rid}, #{img.articleId}, #{img.path})
